name: Invisible Tether
description:
Invisible Tether is a 2D platformer where you have control over 2 boxes which are connected to each other by, well, an invisible tether. The game is chiefly centered around speedrunning by using momentum.

Note: The browser-playable version doesn't seem to be working at the moment. I apologize for the inconvenience. Kindly download the zip file to play the game.
